meta.hint:
A statement tells you about something. It ends
with a full stop. example Tarun took a cookie.
A question asks something. It ends with a question mark.
example Are you coming with me to the party?
An exclamation is like a statement but shows surprise or a
strong feeling. It ends with an exclamation mark.
example How beautiful this city is!
A command tells someone to do something. Most of the
time, a command ends with a full stop. If it shows a strong
feeling, it ends with an exclamation mark.
example Open the door!
Come with me.
meta.question:
Identify whether the given sentence
is a statement, question, command, or question.
